Starters.name: Veg Samosa
Starters.description: A small pastry turnover filled spicy vegetable mixture served with tamarind chutney

Starters.name: Onion Bhaji
Starters.description: Spice indian snack consiting of fried onions and spices

Starters.name: Malabar Fish Fry
Starters.description: Deep fried fish coated in grinded spices of Kerala

Starters.name: Kerala Vegetable Stew
Starters.description: Mildly spiced, creamy, veggie-packed coconut curry

Main.name: Avial with Rice
Main.description: A thick mixture of drumsticks, potatoes and carrots cooked in coconut oil and mustard seeds, served with red rice

Main.name: Masala Dosa
Main.description: Crispy thin crepe stuffed with spicy mash potatoes and onions served with sambar (hot lentil soup)

Main.name: Egg Biryani
Main.description: Boiled egg served with rice cooked with veggies and spices

Desserts.name: Payasam
Desserts.description: South Indian pudding made with vermicelli, whole milk, sweetener and cardamoms and contains cashew nuts and raisons

Desserts.name: Kozhukkattai
Desserts.description: Sweet dumpling made from rice flour, with a filling of grated coconut and jaggery

Desserts.name: Rava Kaseri
Desserts.description: Classic South Indian sweet semolina pudding mixed with cashew nuts and raisons

Desserts.name: Ladoo
Desserts.description: Round, sweet, yellow dessert balls made with gram flour
